foreignData.name: Kugelblitz
foreignData.text:
Verursacht Trampelschaden
Für den Kugelblitz gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht.
Begrabe den Kugelblitz am Ende eines Zuges.

foreignData.name: ボール・ライトニング

mainBoard.name: Ball Lightning
mainBoard.originalText:
Trample
Ball Lightning is unaffected by summoning sickness.
At the end of any turn, bury Ball Lightning.

rulings.text: The creature is sacrificed at the end of every turn in which it is on the battlefield. There is no choice about what turn to sacrifice it.

mainBoard.text:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Ball Lightning.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Although I would give my life to protect Gerrard, my conscience will not let me take another's. There are many who would not hesitate."
—Karn, silver golem

foreignData.name: Stahlgolem
foreignData.text: Du kannst keine Beschwörungszauber oder Artefaktkreaturen sprechen.

mainBoard.name: Steel Golem
mainBoard.originalText: You cannot play summon or artifact creature spells.

rulings.text: Yes, this only affects you.
You can put creatures onto the battlefield by means other than casting them.
A “creature spell” is any spell with the type Creature, even if it has other types such as Artifact or Enchantment. Older cards of type Summon are also Creature spells.

mainBoard.text: You can't cast creature spells.

mainBoard.flavorText: A lightning elemental once killed an entire tribe of merfolk—simply by going for a swim.

foreignData.name: Blitzelementar
foreignData.text: Für das Blitzelementar gilt die Einsatzverzögerung nicht.

mainBoard.name: Lightning Elemental
mainBoard.originalText: Lightning Elemental is unaffected by summoning sickness.
mainBoard.text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

foreignData.name: Erdbeben
foreignData.text: Das Erdbeben fügt allen nichtfliegenden Kreaturen und allen Spielern X Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Earthquake
mainBoard.originalText: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

mainBoard.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

foreignData.name: Feuerball
foreignData.text: Der Feuerball verursacht insgesamt X Schaden. Dieser wird gleichmäßig (aufgerundet) über Zielkreaturen und/oder Spieler verteilt. Bezahle zusätzlich 1 für jedes Ziel mit Ausnahme des ersten.

mainBoard.name: Fireball
mainBoard.originalText: Pay o1 for each target beyond the first: Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of target creatures and/or players.

rulings.text: Fireball's damage is divided as Fireball resolves, not as it's cast, because there are no choices involved. The division involves only targets that are still legal as Fireball resolves.

For example, if X is 5 and you choose three target creatures, Fireball has a total cost of {7}{R} (even though its mana cost is just {5}{R} and its mana value is 6). If those creatures are all still legal targets as Fireball resolves, it deals 1 damage to each of them.
You can target more than X creatures. However, if the number of legal targets at the time Fireball resolves is greater than X, none of them will be dealt any damage.
You may cast Fireball with zero targets, regardless of the value chosen for X. If you do so, it will not be a targeted spell, and no damage will actually be dealt when it resolves.

mainBoard.text:
This spell costs {1} more to cast for each target beyond the first.
Fireball deals X damage divided evenly, rounded down, among any number of targets.

mainBoard.flavorText: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung Deiner Wahl.

mainBoard.name: Disenchant
mainBoard.originalText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

mainBoard.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Yes, I think 'toast' is an appropriate description."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

foreignData.name: Einäscherung
foreignData.text: Die Einäscherung fügt einem Spieler oder einer Kreatur Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu. Kreaturen, denen die Einäscherung in diesem Zug Schaden zugefügt hat, können nicht regenerieren.

mainBoard.name: Incinerate
mainBoard.originalText: Incinerate deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Creatures damaged by Incinerate cannot regenerate this turn.

rulings.text: Regeneration abilities that would affect that creature can still be activated; they just won’t do anything. The creature can’t be regenerated for any reason, even if an effect other than Incinerate would deal lethal damage to it or otherwise destroy it.

mainBoard.text: Incinerate deals 3 damage to any target. A creature dealt damage this way can't be regenerated this turn.

mainBoard.flavorText: Hope of deliverance is scorched by the fire of futility.

foreignData.name: Anfachen
foreignData.text: Das Anfachen fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Schadenspunkte in Höhe von 2 plus der Anzahl an Anfachen-Karten in allen Friedhöfen zu.

mainBoard.name: Kindle
mainBoard.originalText: Kindle deals to target creature or player an amount of damage equal to 2 plus the number of Kindle cards in all graveyards.

rulings.text: Because Kindle is still on the stack as you perform its instructions, it isn't in your graveyard and won't add to the amount of damage dealt.

mainBoard.text: Kindle deals X damage to any target, where X is 2 plus the number of cards named Kindle in all graveyards.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"Most wizards consider a thunderbolt to be a proper retort."
—Ertai, wizard adept

foreignData.name: Donnerschlag
foreignData.text: Der Donnerschlag fügt einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte oder einer fliegenden Kreatur Deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Thunderbolt
mainBoard.originalText: Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or 4 damage to target creature with flying.
mainBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Thunderbolt deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker.
• Thunderbolt deals 4 damage to target creature with flying.

foreignData.name: Hammer aus Bogardan
foreignData.text:
Der Hammer aus Bogardan fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 3 Schadenspunkte zu.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Bringe den Hammer aus Bogardan zurück auf Deine Hand. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur während Deiner Versorgungsphase und nur, wenn der Hammer aus Bogardan auf Deinem Friedhof liegt.

mainBoard.name: Hammer of Bogardan
mainBoard.originalText:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
o2o
Ro
Roo
R Return Hammer of Bogardan to your hand. Use this ability only during your upkeep and only if Hammer of Bogardan is in your graveyard.
mainBoard.text:
Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target.
{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.

mainBoard.flavorText: "The cannon wasn't aimed at you!" pleaded Vhati. "I'm not sure which is more pathetic," replied Greven, "your judgment or your aim."

foreignData.name: Reue
foreignData.text: Eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl fügt sich selbst Schadenspunkte in Höhe ihrer Stärke zu.

mainBoard.name: Repentance
mainBoard.originalText: Target creature deals to itself damage equal to its power.
mainBoard.text: Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.

mainBoard.flavorText: Embermages aren't well known for their diplomatic skills.

foreignData.name: Feuerstoß
foreignData.text:
Du kannst zwei Gebirge opfern, anstatt die Spruchkosten des Feuerstoßes zu bezahlen.
Der Feuerstoß fügt einer Kreatur oder einem Spieler Deiner Wahl 4 Schadenspunkte zu.

mainBoard.name: Fireblast
mainBoard.originalText: You may sacrifice two mountains instead of paying Fireblast's casting cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.
mainBoard.text:
You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Fireblast deals 4 damage to any target.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The raging waters had swept away trees, bridges, and even houses. My healers had much work to do."
—Halvor Arenson, Kjeldoran priest

foreignData.name: Jokulhaups
foreignData.text: Begrabe alle Artefakte, Kreaturen und Länder.

mainBoard.name: Jokulhaups
mainBoard.originalText: Bury all artifacts, creatures, and lands.
mainBoard.text: Destroy all artifacts, creatures, and lands. They can't be regenerated.

mainBoard.flavorText: Every line holds a tale, and between lie a thousand more.

foreignData.name: Zauberbuch der Thran
foreignData.text: 5, {T}: Zeige die obersten drei Karten Deiner Bibliothek einem Gegner Deiner Wahl. Begrabe eine dieser Karten, die dieser Gegner auswählt. Ziehe die übrigen Karten.

mainBoard.name: Thran Tome
mainBoard.originalText:
o5, oc
T: Reveal the top three cards of your library to target opponent. Bury one of those cards of that opponent's choice. Draw the remaining cards.

rulings.text: It does not target the cards, but it targets the opponent. If you can’t target an opponent, you can’t activate this ability.
After the opponent chooses which card to put into your graveyard, you draw two cards regardless of how many were actually revealed or how many you have left in your library.

mainBoard.text: {5}, {T}: Reveal the top three cards of your library. Target opponent chooses one of those cards. Put that card into your graveyard, then draw two cards.

foreignData.name: Der Schmelzofen von Rath
foreignData.text: Verdopple allen Schaden, der Kreaturen oder Spielern zugeteilt wird.

mainBoard.name: Furnace of Rath
mainBoard.originalText: Double all damage assigned to any creature or player.

rulings.text: If a spell or ability damages multiple things, divide up the damage before applying this effect. This means you can’t normally end up with an odd amount of damage on something.
If you have two of these on the battlefield, the damage is multiplied by 4.
The multiplied damage counts in all ways as if it came from the original source. Furnace of Rath is not the source.
The trample rules cause damage to be divided before it is doubled.

If multiple effects modify how damage will be dealt, the player who would be dealt damage or the controller of the creature that would be dealt damage chooses the order to apply the effects. For example, Mending Hands says, “Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.” Suppose a spell would deal 5 damage to a player who has cast Mending Hands targeting themselves. That player can either (a) prevent 4 damage first and then let Furnace of Rath double the remaining 1 damage, taking 2 damage, or (b) double the damage to 10 and then prevent 4 damage, taking 6 damage.

mainBoard.text: If a source would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

foreignData.name: Zwergenruinen
foreignData.text:
Die Zwergenruinen kommen getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um R.
{T}, opfere die Zwergenruinen: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um RR.

oc

foreignData.name: Edelsteinmine
foreignData.text:
Lege drei Minenmarken auf die Edelsteinmine, wenn sie ins Spiel kommt.
{T}, entferne eine Minenmarke von der Edelsteinmine: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Begrabe die Edelsteinmine, wenn keine Minenmarken auf ihr liegen.

mainBoard.name: Gemstone Mine
mainBoard.originalText:
When Gemstone Mine comes into play, put three mining counters on it.
oc
T, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, bury it.

rulings.text: If the last mining counter is removed from Gemstone Mine in some way other than activating its ability, Gemstone Mine won’t be sacrificed (and its ability can’t be activated).

mainBoard.text:
Gemstone Mine enters with three mining counters on it.
{T}, Remove a mining counter from Gemstone Mine: Add one mana of any color. If there are no mining counters on Gemstone Mine, sacrifice it.

mainBoard.name: Mountain
mainBoard.originalText:
oc
T: Add o
R to your mana pool.

mainBoard.flavorText:
"The reflection of land interests me far more than its reality."
—Volrath

foreignData.name: Widerspiegelnder Teich
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana eines Typs, welches ein Land, das Du kontrollierst, produzieren kann.

mainBoard.name: Reflecting Pool
mainBoard.originalText:
oc
T: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type that any land you control can produce.

rulings.text: Any change to a land's type or splicing of text into a land can affect the types of mana a land can produce.
Any replacement effects are considered by Reflecting Pool when determining the types of mana a land can produce.

Multiple Reflecting Pools won't help each other produce mana. If you control a Reflecting Pool, and all other lands you control either lack mana abilities or are other Reflecting Pools, you may still activate Reflecting Pool's ability — it just won't produce any mana.

Reflecting Pool checks the effects of all mana-producing abilities of lands you control, but it doesn't check their costs. For example, Vivid Crag says "{T}, Remove a charge counter from Vivid Crag: Add one mana of any color." If you control Vivid Crag and Reflecting Pool, you can tap Reflecting Pool for any color of mana. It doesn't matter whether Vivid Crag has a charge counter on it, and it doesn't matter whether it's untapped.
Reflecting Pool doesn't care about any restrictions or riders your lands put on the mana they produce, such as Pillar of the Paruns and Hall of the Bandit Lord do. It just cares about types of mana.
The types of mana are white, blue, black, red, green, and colorless.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce.

foreignData.name: Zernarbtes Land
foreignData.text:
Das Zernarbet Land kommt getappt ins Spiel.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein farbloses Mana.
{T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um {R} oder W. Das Zernarbte Land fügt Dir 1 Schadenspunkt zu.

oc

oc

R or o
W to your mana pool. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.
mainBoard.text:

{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Scabland deals 1 damage to you.

mainBoard.flavorText: Jolrael's choice of homes was far better than her choice of allies.

foreignData.name: Unentdecktes Paradies
foreignData.text: {T}: Erhöhe Deinen Manavorrat um ein Mana einer beliebigen Farbe. Bringe das Unentdeckte Paradies zu Beginn Deiner nächsten Enttap-Phase auf die Hand seines Besitzers zurück.

mainBoard.name: Undiscovered Paradise
mainBoard.originalText:
oc
T: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. At the beginning of your next untap phase, return Undiscovered Paradise to owner's hand.

rulings.text: It will return even if some effect prevents you from untapping it. The ability is not replacing the untapping of the land in any way.
Only returns to owner’s hand if it is still on the battlefield at the beginning of its controller’s next untap.

mainBoard.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color. During your next untap step, as you untap your permanents, return Undiscovered Paradise to its owner's hand.

foreignData.name: Erdbeben
foreignData.text: Das Erdbeben fügt allen nichtfliegenden Kreaturen und allen Spielern X Schadenspunkte zu.

sideBoard.originalText: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

rulings.text: Whether or not a creature is without flying is only checked on resolution.

sideBoard.text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

foreignData.name: Phyrexianischer Ofen
foreignData.text:
{T}: Entferne die unterste Karte aus dem Friedhof eines Spielers Deiner Wahl ganz aus dem Spiel.
1, opfere den Phyrexianischen Ofen: Entferne eine Karte Deiner Wahl aus irgendeinem Friedhof ganz aus dem Spiel und ziehe eine Karte.

sideBoard.name: Phyrexian Furnace
sideBoard.originalText:
oc
T: Remove the bottom card of target player's graveyard from the game.
o1, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Remove target card in any graveyard from the game and draw a card.
sideBoard.text:
{T}: Exile the bottom card of target player's graveyard.
{1}, Sacrifice Phyrexian Furnace: Exile target card from a graveyard. Draw a card.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"Just the thing for those pesky water mages."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

foreignData.name: Pyroknall
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch Deiner Wahl, wenn er blau ist, oder zerstöre eine bleibende Karte Deiner Wahl, wenn sie blau ist. Spiele diesen Zauberspruch als Spontanzauber, wenn er auf eine bleibende Karte zielt.

sideBoard.name: Pyroblast
sideBoard.originalText: Counter target spell if it is blue, or destroy target permanent if it is blue. (If this spell targets a permanent, play it as an instant.)

rulings.text: The decision to counter a spell or destroy a permanent is a decision made on announcement before the target is selected. If the spell is redirected, this mode can’t be changed, so only targets of the selected type are valid.
Pyroblast can target any spell or permanent, not just a blue one. It checks the color of the target only on resolution.

sideBoard.text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

sideBoard.flavorText: The swarm seemed unmoved by the artificial slivers' destruction. "They clearly were not the leaders," Hanna cursed. "I guess we'll have to do this the hard way."

foreignData.name: Entzauberung
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt oder eine Verzauberung Deiner Wahl.

sideBoard.name: Disenchant

rulings.text: This is not modal. If the target changes from an artifact to an enchantment or vice versa, this still destroys it.

sideBoard.flavorText: These tears of pain I weep to the skies, Not bitter drops, but water made divine. Each gem of sorrow slips, no longer mine, But proffered thus to echo other cries.

foreignData.name: Göttliche Gabe
foreignData.text: Zerstöre ein Artefakt Deiner Wahl. Du erhältst Lebenspunkte in der Höhe der Spruchkosten des Artefakts dazu.

sideBoard.name: Divine Offering
sideBoard.originalText: Destroy target artifact. Gain an amount of life equal to that artifact's total casting cost.

rulings.text: If the target artifact becomes illegal before resolution, you do not gain any life.
If Divine Offering resolves, but the artifact regenerates or has indestructible, you'll still gain the life.

sideBoard.text: Destroy target artifact. You gain life equal to its mana value.

sideBoard.flavorText: As Orim put the lightning rod into place on the bow, she cast a spell of protection to shield herself from the heat. That's when the Furnace got personal.

foreignData.name: Unordnung
foreignData.text: Immer wenn ein Gegner Deiner Wahl einen weißen Zauberspruch erfolgreich spricht, verliert dieser 2 Lebenspunkte.

sideBoard.name: Havoc
sideBoard.originalText: Whenever target opponent successfully casts a white spell, he or she loses 2 life.

rulings.text: In a multiplayer game, it affects all opponents.

sideBoard.text: Whenever an opponent casts a white spell, they lose 2 life.

sideBoard.flavorText:
"The fishers will throw out their nets and draw them back filled with dust."
—Oracle *en*-Vec

foreignData.name: Kochende See
foreignData.text: Zerstöre alle Inseln.

sideBoard.name: Boil

sideBoard.flavorText:
"Know your foes' strengths as well as their weaknesses."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi machinist

foreignData.name: Narrenkappe
foreignData.text: 2, {T}, opfere die Narrenkappe: Schaue Dir die Bibliothek eines Gegners Deiner Wahl und entferne drei Karten davon ganz aus dem Spiel. Mische diese Bibliothek danach neu.

sideBoard.name: Jester's Cap
sideBoard.originalText:
o2, oc
T, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Look through target player's library and remove any three of those cards from the game. Shuffle that library afterwards.

rulings.text: As long as there are three or more cards in that library, you must find three cards and exile them. If there are fewer than three cards in the player's library, you exile all of them.

sideBoard.text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Jester's Cap: Search target player's library for three cards and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
